content:
VACATION MODE: ACTIVATED

Fisherman’s Wharf, North Beach, and the Embarcadero, lined with family-fun activities, top restaurants, trendy bars, and iconic attractions, are the heart of San Francisco - and Hotel Caza is in the middle of it all. As San Francisco pulsates outside, our bright, spacious rooms help you relax and recharge in comfort and style. Hotel Caza has been designed for explorers seeking exclusive surroundings and ultimate fun to create memories that are nothing short of unforgettable.
